lines.text: You know, Johnny, when you play solitaire you can only beat yourself.
My old man always said, liquor doesn't drown your troubles - just teaches 'em to swim.
You can't take the law into your own hands! Things aren't done that way!
That depends on who's doing them.
She's about as chummy as Leo Durocher with an umpire.

[to Rocky, holding a cookbook]
Lookin' for a recipe? Well, you've got one - for trouble!
